description: This file defines REST API resources for managing network devices, including listing, creating, updating, deleting devices, and pinging devices by name. It uses Flask, Flask-RESTful, and pymongo for database interactions.

classes.name: DevicesResource
classes.description: Handles collection-level operations for devices, including listing all devices and creating new devices.

classes.name: DeviceResource
classes.description: Handles individual device operations such as retrieving, updating, and deleting a device by name.

classes.name: PingResource
classes.description: Provides functionality to ping a device by name and report its status.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests for listing all devices or retrieving a device by name, depending on the resource.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new device with a unique name.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update device details by name.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a device by name.

methods.name: get (in PingResource)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to ping a device by name and return status and timestamp.
